title: roswear Wide Leg Jeans Woman High Waist Stretchy Loose Denim Pants
description: Comfortable Fabric: Crafted from stretchy denim fabric, these baggy jeans are comfortable and breathable, offering flexible and relaxing freedom all day long
Flattering High Waisted Design: Featuring a high waist and three-button design, the wide leg jeans present a flattering fit that accentuates your curves and elongates your legs
Practical Pockets: The patch pockets in the design not only add a charming detail but also offer practicality, enabling you to keep your essentials handy while maintaining a sleek look
Versatile Choice: Baggy jeans bring a hint of vintage charm to your ensemble and are ideal for casual occasions, vacations, school, daily life, and more, thus making them an essential in your closet
Size Tips: Amazon generic size chart is NOT our size. Please carefully refer to our detailed size chart on the left picture before you purchase
